File.AllUsersWebPart: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <WebPart xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2"> <Title>My Planner</Title> <FrameType>Default</FrameType> <Description /> <IsIncluded>true</IsIncluded> <ZoneID>Left</ZoneID> <PartOrder>0</PartOrder> <FrameState>Normal</FrameState> <Height /> <Width /> <AllowRemove>true</AllowRemove> <AllowZoneChange>true</AllowZoneChange> <AllowMinimize>true</AllowMinimize> <AllowConnect>true</AllowConnect> <AllowEdit>true</AllowEdit> <AllowHide>true</AllowHide> <IsVisible>true</IsVisible> <DetailLink /> <HelpLink /> <HelpMode>Modeless</HelpMode> <Dir>Default</Dir> <PartImageSmall /> <MissingAssembly>Cannot import this Web Part.</MissingAssembly> <PartImageLarge /> <IsIncludedFilter /> <Assembly>MLG2007.WebParts.MyPlanner, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=9f4da00116c38ec5</Assembly> <TypeName>MLG2007.WebParts.MyPlanner.MyPlanner</TypeName> <ExchangeUrl xmlns="MLG2007.WebParts.MyPlanner"></ExchangeUrl> <ExchangeDomain xmlns="MLG2007.WebParts.MyPlanner"></ExchangeDomain> <UserPreferencesStoreUrl xmlns="MLG2007.WebParts.MyPlanner">../../Lists/User%20Preferences%20Store/AllItems.aspx</UserPreferencesStoreUrl> <CalendarsListUrl xmlns="MLG2007.WebParts.MyPlanner">../../Lists/Planner%20Calendars%20Store/AllItems.aspx</CalendarsListUrl> <PlannerRole xmlns="MLG2007.WebParts.MyPlanner">Teachers</PlannerRole> <DNSName xmlns="MLG2007.WebParts.MyPlanner">lpsharepoint</DNSName> <ShowSLK xmlns="MLG2007.WebParts.MyPlanner">true</ShowSLK> <ShowPersonalCalendar xmlns="MLG2007.WebParts.MyPlanner">true</ShowPersonalCalendar> <SharePointCalendarIDList xmlns="MLG2007.WebParts.MyPlanner" /> <ExchangeCalendarIDList xmlns="MLG2007.WebParts.MyPlanner" /> </WebPart>
